name: Ganymedes
description:
Developer's note: This is an early fps prototype. It's a shool project from 2015. I lost most of the game files, and I'm afraid I won't be able to finish it. Unfortunately, the game is available only in Czech language, but it can be played even without knowing Czech.

What is the story of Ganymedes?
In the near future, mankind discovered how to obtain valuable gases from planet Jupiter. Soon after, mining colonies have been built on Jupiter's moons. Everything was going well, until one colony stopped responding.

Welcome to Ganymedes, a huge, cold, floating rock in space. You were sent here to find out why the colony isn't responding. You should prepare for the worst.
